Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Not the fanciest, yet it offers delicious wholesome pasta.  The carbonara was fantastic.  Fast, friendly service. And that tiramisu!!  Coming back to try the pizza.

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Pizza was very good. Sauce was amazing.  We had fried calamari, risotto balls and margarita pizza. The food was delicious and everything tasted fresh.  Service was excellent üëç

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Had a wonderful experience trying Il Gusto out for the first time! Warm and cozy little Italian joint with welcoming and friendly staff. The Alfredo pasta was delicious, very tasty and al dente! Reasonable prices and good portion sizes. Highly recommend and will definitely be going again!

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: We came all the way from San Francisco .Had a bunch of food, and the taste of food was outstanding.The location and hospitality of the staff is highly appreciated. The chef Hari is well renowned in all Bay Area Il Fornaio restaurant  so I like his food and  love  to go back again.

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Some of the best Pizza I've had in the bay and the Calamari was fantastic.  I will be back to try the pasta. The service was wonderful and I really enjoyed my dinner.

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Delicious food (pasta, tenderloin, salmon) and we were offered a free dessert. Service was very nice and friendly. Thank you!

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: Best pizza in the Bay Area and also the calamari is FANTASTIC. Friendly people, service unparalleled, coming back to this place to eat next time I am in town!

Review Text: Super helpful staff, was accommodate to our vegan pizza request!

Name: IL Gusto
Review Text: We went here on a quiet Tuesday evening last week. Food was excellent and so was the service.

Name: IL Gusto
